indicator.summary: Vortex Indicator (VI) is a measure of price directional movement. It includes positive and negative indicators, and is often used to identify trends and reversals. See documentation for more information.
indicator.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
indicator.param: Number of periods in the lookback window.
indicator.returns: Time series of VI+ and VI- vortex movement indicator values.
